# Rodentia
Rodentia are a race of humanoid beings resembling rodents. Resourceful, evasive, sneaky, but fragile.
## Diet
Rodentia share evolutionary roots with rodents, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea! Despite their dietary restrictions, they get hungry 33% faster than other species.
## Claws
Rodentia have dull claws, which do a mixture of [color=orange]Blunt[/color] and [color=orange]Slashing[/color] damage.
## Sticky Fingers
Rodentia can rummage in disposal units, potentially finding food and other useful trinkets! Unfortunately, their feet also have a tendency to get painfully caught in mousetraps, even if they're wearing shoes.
## Cheek Storage
Rodentia can store small items in their cheeks. Having items in their mouth makes their speech unintelligible, and they will drop all items in their mouth if attacked, stunned, or shoved.
## Damage
Due to being smaller and more fragile than other species, Rodentia take 30% more [color=orange]Blunt[/color] damage, and 15% more [color=orange]Slashing[/color] and [color=orange]Piercing[/color] damage.
## Rodentia Naming Conventions
Rodentia typically have names structured by a descriptor followed by a pet sounding first name.
[bullet] Short-legged Noodle
[bullet] Long-tail Chitters
[bullet] Squeaky Cheesetail
